# WEAPON::REMOVE_WEAPON_COMPONENT_FROM_WEAPON_OBJECT

## Summary
Delete the specified component from the specified weapon object (created via CREATE_WEAPON_OBJECT)

## Parameters
* **OBJECT_INDEX** weaponObjectIndex
* **WEAPONCOMPONENT_TYPE** weaponComponent

## Description

see DOES_WEAPON_TAKE_WEAPON_COMPONENT for full list of weapons & components
